tab1.title1: <TextStyle.green>WELCOME TO LUTRALITH'S KINGDOM RP PVP SERVER</>
tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>NEW PLAYERS:</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">Please take a moment to read the rules on the Rules tab.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">Our discord link: https://discord.gg/lutralith</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">1. No Human/Humano/Mens/Mensch names.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">1. Play fairly. Nobody likes exploiters or cheaters.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">2. Join the discord and get recruited into a kingdom.</>


<TextStyle.Yellow>STARTER KIT:</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">Join our discord and go to roles. React to PVE/PVP Chat to access the chats.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Make a ticket to request a starter pack</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Starter kits are given one per person.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Don't make secondary accounts to take advantage of the starter kits.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Starter kits on our other servers are different. You will only receive the starter kit provided down below for this server.</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Leaders and followers will receive different starter kits.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">Remember to have fun and keep it clean.</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">The starter kit includes the following:</>

<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Leader: Runic wyvern/other flying creature</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Leader/followers: Metal pike</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Leader/followers: Metal Pike</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Leader: Flak armor set</>
<RichColor Color="255,255,255,1">- Followers: 1 Medium dino of your choice.</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>No harassment or bullying.</>

<TextStyle.White>No racism or slurs.</>

<TextStyle.White>No threatening of any kind.</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>No offline killing to gain leadership/strip deities of their weapon/armor.</>
